IntroUi.Agreement.Paragraph1: To use Snowcloak, you must be over the age of 18, or 21 in some jurisdictions.
IntroUi.Agreement.Paragraph2: All of the mod files currently active on your character as well as your current character state will be uploaded to the service you registered yourself at automatically. The plugin will exclusively upload the necessary mod files and not the whole mod.
IntroUi.Agreement.Paragraph3: If you are on a data capped internet connection, higher fees due to data usage depending on the amount of downloaded and uploaded mod files might occur. Mod files will be compressed on up- and download to save on bandwidth usage. Due to varying up- and download speeds, changes in characters might not be visible immediately. Files present on the service that already represent your active mod files will not be uploaded again.
IntroUi.Agreement.Paragraph4: The mod files you are uploading are confidential and will not be distributed to parties other than the ones who are requesting the exact same mod files. Please think about who you are going to pair since it is unavoidable that they will receive and locally cache the necessary mod files that you have currently in use. Locally cached mod files will have arbitrary file names to discourage attempts at replicating the original mod.
IntroUi.Agreement.Paragraph5: The plugin creator tried their best to keep you secure. However, there is no guarantee for 100% security. Do not blindly pair your client with everyone.
IntroUi.Agreement.Paragraph6: Mod files that are saved on the service will remain on the service as long as there are requests for the files from clients. After a period of not being used, the mod files may be automatically deleted.
IntroUi.Agreement.Paragraph7: Accounts that are inactive for ninety (90) days will be deleted for privacy reasons.
IntroUi.Agreement.Paragraph8: Snowcloak is operated from servers located in the European Union. You agree not to upload any content to the service that violates EU law; and more specifically, German law.
IntroUi.Agreement.Paragraph9: You may delete your account at any time from within the Settings panel of the plugin. Any mods unique to you will then be removed from the server within 14 days.
IntroUi.Agreement.Timeout: 'I agree' button will be available in {0}s
IntroUi.Registration.Description1: To be able to use Snowcloak you will have to register an account.
IntroUi.Registration.Description2: Refer to the instructions at the location you obtained this plugin for more information or support.
IntroUi.Registration.Legacy.Success:
New account registered.
Please keep a copy of your secret key in case you need to reset your plugins, or to use it on another PC.
IntroUi.Registration.NewAccountPrompt: If you have not used Snowcloak before, click below to register a new account.
IntroUi.Registration.SecretKey.Format: Your secret key can only contain ABCDEF and the numbers 0-9.
IntroUi.Registration.SecretKey.Instructi: If you already have a registered account, you can enter its secret key below to use it instead.
IntroUi.Registration.SecretKey.Label: Secret Key
IntroUi.Registration.SecretKey.Length: Your secret key must be exactly 64 characters long.
IntroUi.Registration.UnknownError: An unknown error occured. Please try again later.
IntroUi.Storage.Description1: To not unnecessary download files already present on your computer, Snowcloak will have to scan your Penumbra mod directory. Additionally, a local storage folder must be set where Snowcloak will download other character files to. Once the storage folder is set and the scan complete, this page will automatically forward to registration at a service.
IntroUi.Storage.Description2: Note: The initial scan, depending on the amount of mods you have, might take a while. Please wait until it is completed.
IntroUi.Storage.InvalidPenumbra: You do not have a valid Penumbra path set. Open Penumbra and set up a valid path for the mod directory.
IntroUi.Storage.UseCompactor.Help: The File Compactor can save a tremendeous amount of space on the hard disk for downloads through Snowcloak. It will incur a minor CPU penalty on download but can speed up loading of other characters. It is recommended to keep it enabled. You can change this setting later anytime in the Snowcloak settings.
IntroUi.Storage.Warning.Files: Warning: once past this step you should not delete SnowcloakFiles.csv or Snowcloak.db in the Plugin Configurations folder of Dalamud. Otherwise on the next launch a full re-scan of the file cache database will be initiated.
IntroUi.Storage.Warning.Scan: Warning: if the scan is hanging and does nothing for a long time, chances are high your Penumbra folder is not set up properly.
IntroUi.Welcome.Description1: Snowcloak is a plugin that will replicate your full current character state including all Penumbra mods to other paired users. Note that you will have to have Penumbra as well as Glamourer installed to use this plugin.
IntroUi.Welcome.Description2: We will have to setup a few things first before you can start using this plugin. Click on next to continue.
IntroUi.Welcome.Warning: Note: Any modifications you have applied through anything but Penumbra cannot be shared and your character state on other clients might look broken because of this or others players mods might not apply on your end altogether. If you want to use this plugin you will have to move your mods to Penumbra.
SettingsUi.Advanced.Capabilities.Descrip: This section details the current capability levels of your client. This information is primarily used for debugging purposes, and will be used in future version to ensure servers communicate with your client in a way it can understand.
SettingsUi.Advanced.Debug.CopyCharacterD: [DEBUG] Copy Last created Character Data to clipboard
ERROR: No created character data, cannot copy.
Use this when reporting mods being rejected from the server.
SettingsUi.Advanced.LogEvents: Log Event Viewer data to disk
SettingsUi.Advanced.LogPerformance.Help: Enabling this can incur a (slight) performance impact. Enabling this for extended periods of time is not recommended.
SettingsUi.Advanced.SerializedApplicatio: Experimental - May reduce issues in crowded areas
SettingsUi.BlockedTransfers.Description: Files that you attempted to upload or download that were forbidden to be transferred by their creators will appear here. If you see file paths from your drive here, then those files were not allowed to be uploaded. If you see hashes, those files were not allowed to be downloaded. Ask your paired friend to send you the mod in question through other means or acquire the mod yourself.
SettingsUi.Chat.ChatChannel.Help: FFXIV chat channel to output chat messages on.
SettingsUi.Chat.DisableGlobally.Help: Global setting to disable chat for all syncshells.
SettingsUi.Chat.ExtraChat.TagMessages.He:
If enabled, messages will be filtered under the category "ExtraChat channels: All".

This works even if ExtraChat is also installed and enabled.
SettingsUi.Chat.Syncshell.Channel.Help: Override the FFXIV chat channel used for this syncshell.
SettingsUi.Chat.Syncshell.ConnectHint: Connect to the server to configure individual syncshell settings.
SettingsUi.Chat.Syncshell.JoinHint: Once you join a syncshell you can configure its chat settings here.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Enable.Help: Disable to hide pairing highlights, suppress right-click pairing actions, and pause auto-rejection.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Enable.Popup.Body1: Frostbrand is a system that, when opted-in to, shows other nearby users who've opted in that you're open to pairing.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Enable.Popup.Body2: Whilst Snowcloak provides filters to automatically reject those you're not interested in pairing with, please be aware that while you have it enabled, anyone using Frostbrand will be able to see that you're using Snowcloak.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Enable.Popup.Body3: Please take the time to understand the privacy risk this introduces, and if you choose to enable the system, you're advised to configure filters immediately, preferably in a quiet area.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Enable.Popup.Urian: Frostbrand be a covenant of mutual accord, whereby those who do willingly partake therein may perceive, among the souls nearby, others likewise disposed unto pairing.

Know this also: though Snowcloak doth grant thee wards and strictures, by which thou mayest deny communion with those thou wouldst not suffer, yet whilst Frostbrand remaineth enabled, any who wield its sight shall discern that thou makest use of Snowcloak.

Ponder well, then, the peril to thine own privacy that this revelation entailest. Shouldst thou resolve to walk this path regardless, thou art strongly counseled to set thy filters with all haste - best done where few eyes linger and fewer ears attend.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Filters.ClanDescri: If you don't want to interact with a certain kind of character regardless of their level, check the appropriate box below. Requests from matching characters will be rejected.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Filters.Descriptio:
Snowcloak will automatically filter pair requests from the following characters if they're within inspection range.

 Note: If the sender is not within visible range, the request will show as pending and will be checked when they're next in range.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Filters.MinimumLev: Set to 0 to disable level-based rejection.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Filters.PlateNotic: Please note: Snowcloak can only make determinations for this feature based on their unpaired, unglamoured state. For your safety, the client does not attempt to automatically load adventurer plates.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.Highlighting.Color: Opted-in Frostbrand users are shown to you in this color while Frostbrand is enabled.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.HomeworldFilters.H: Checked homeworlds are filtered out when Frostbrand pairing is enabled.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.PersistentKey.Help: Link a XIVAuth account to enable Frostbrand. Please visit the user guide to learn how to do this.
SettingsUi.Frostbrand.PersistentKeyRequi: You need to link a XIVAuth account before opting into Frostbrand. Please visit the user guide to learn how to do this.
SettingsUi.General.Notes.Autofill: Automatically update empty notes with player names
SettingsUi.General.Notes.Autofill.Help: This will automatically set a user's note with their player name unless you override it
SettingsUi.General.Notes.Export: Export all your user notes to clipboard
SettingsUi.General.Notes.Import.Failure: Attempt to import notes from clipboard failed. Check formatting and try again
SettingsUi.General.Notes.OpenPopup: Open Notes Popup on user addition
SettingsUi.General.Notes.OpenPopup.Help: This will open a popup that allows you to set the notes for a user after successfully adding them to your individual pairs.
SettingsUi.General.Notes.Overwrite.Help: If this option is selected all already existing notes for UIDs will be overwritten by the imported notes.
SettingsUi.General.Notifications.Disable: Enabling this will not show any "Warning" labeled messages for missing optional plugins.
SettingsUi.General.Notifications.EnableO: Enabling this will show a small notification (type: Info) in the bottom right corner when pairs go online.
SettingsUi.General.Notifications.ErrorDi:
The location where "Error" notifications will display.
'Nowhere' will not show any Error notifications
'Chat' will print Error notifications in chat
'Toast' will show Error toast notifications in the bottom right corner
'Both' will show chat as well as the toast notification
SettingsUi.General.Notifications.InfoDis:
The location where "Info" notifications will display.
'Nowhere' will not show any Info notifications
'Chat' will print Info notifications in chat
'Toast' will show Warning toast notifications in the bottom right corner
'Both' will show chat as well as the toast notification
SettingsUi.General.Notifications.OnlyInd: Enabling this will only show online notifications (type: Info) for individual pairs.
SettingsUi.General.Notifications.OnlyNam: Enabling this will only show online notifications (type: Info) for pairs where you have set an individual note.
SettingsUi.General.Notifications.Warning:
The location where "Warning" notifications will display.
'Nowhere' will not show any Warning notifications
'Chat' will print Warning notifications in chat
'Toast' will show Warning toast notifications in the bottom right corner
'Both' will show chat as well as the toast notification
SettingsUi.General.Ui.ColorTooltip.Foreg: Foreground Color - Set to pure black (#000000) to use the default color
SettingsUi.General.Ui.ColorTooltip.Glow: Glow Color - Set to pure black (#000000) to use the default color
SettingsUi.General.Ui.DtrEntry: Display status and visible pair count in Server Info Bar
SettingsUi.General.Ui.DtrEntry.Help:
This will add Snowcloak connection status and visible pair count in the Server Info Bar.
You can further configure this through your Dalamud Settings.
SettingsUi.General.Ui.DtrEntry.PreferNot: Prefer notes over player names in tooltip
SettingsUi.General.Ui.DtrEntry.ShowUid: Show visible character's UID in tooltip
SettingsUi.General.Ui.DtrEntry.UseColors: Color-code the Server Info Bar entry according to status
SettingsUi.General.Ui.EnableRightClick: Enable Game Right Click Menu Entries
SettingsUi.General.Ui.EnableRightClick.H: This will add Snowcloak related right click menu entries in the game UI on paired players.
SettingsUi.General.Ui.GroupByStatus.Help: This will categorize users by their connection status in the main UI.
SettingsUi.General.Ui.HoverDelay.Help: Delay until the profile should be displayed
SettingsUi.General.Ui.ProfileOnRight.Hel: Will show profiles on the right side of the main UI
SettingsUi.General.Ui.RenderBbcodeImages: Disable this to show [img] tags as text instead of loading external images.
SettingsUi.General.Ui.ShowNsfw.Help: Will show profiles that have the NSFW tag enabled
SettingsUi.General.Ui.ShowPlayerNames.He: This will show character names instead of UIDs when possible
SettingsUi.General.Ui.ShowProfiles.Help: This will show the configured user profile after a set delay
SettingsUi.General.Ui.SortByVram: Sort visible syncshell users by VRAM usage
SettingsUi.General.Ui.SortByVram.Help: This will put users using the most VRAM in a syncshell at the top of the list.
SettingsUi.General.Ui.VisibleGroup.Help: This will show all currently visible users in a special 'Visible' group in the main UI.
SettingsUi.General.Venues.AutoJoin: Show prompts to join venue syncshells when on their grounds
SettingsUi.General.Venues.AutoJoin.Help: Automatically detects venue housing plots and offers users an option to join them.
SettingsUi.Performance.AutoPause.Help:
When enabled, it will automatically block the modded appearance of all players that exceed the thresholds defined below.
Will print a warning in chat when a player is blocked automatically.
SettingsUi.Performance.AutoPause.NotifyD: Display auto-block warnings for individual pairs
SettingsUi.Performance.AutoPause.NotifyG: Display auto-block warnings for syncshell pairs
SettingsUi.Performance.AutoPause.Triangl: When a loading in player and their triangle count exceeds this amount, automatically blocks the synced player.--SEP--Default: 375 thousand
SettingsUi.Performance.AutoPause.VramThr: When a loading in player and their VRAM usage exceeds this amount, automatically blocks the synced player.--SEP--Default: 550 MiB
SettingsUi.Performance.Blacklist.Descrip: The entries in the list below will never have their characters displayed.
SettingsUi.Performance.Blacklist.Hint:
Hint: UIDs are case sensitive.
Vanity IDs are also acceptable.
SettingsUi.Performance.CurrentVram: Current VRAM utilization by all nearby players:
SettingsUi.Performance.DeleteOriginalTex: Deletes original, full-sized, textures from disk after downloading and shrinking.--SEP--Caution!!! This will cause a re-download of all textures when the shrink option is disabled.
SettingsUi.Performance.Description: The configuration options here are to give you more informed warnings and automation when it comes to other performance-intensive synced players.
SettingsUi.Performance.ShrinkTextures.He:
Automatically shrinks texture resolution of synced players to reduce VRAM utilization.--SEP--Texture Size Limit (DXT/BC5/BC7 Compressed): 2048x2048
Texture Size Limit (A8R8G8B8 Uncompressed): 1024x1024--SEP--Enable to reduce lag in large crowds.
Disable this for higher quality during GPose.
SettingsUi.Performance.Whitelist.AllPair: Individual pairs will never be affected by auto blocks.
SettingsUi.Performance.Whitelist.Descrip: The entries in the list below will be not have auto block thresholds enforced.
SettingsUi.Performance.Whitelist.Hint:
Hint: UIDs are case sensitive.
Vanity IDs are also acceptable.
SettingsUi.Service.Actions.DeleteAccount: Your account and all associated files and data on the service will be deleted.
Your UID will be removed from all pairing lists.
Are you sure you want to continue?
Completely deletes your currently connected account.
Characters listed here will connect with the specified secret key.
You need to add a Secret Key first before adding Characters.
SettingsUi.Service.ReconnectNotice: For any changes to be applied to the current service you need to reconnect to the service.
SettingsUi.Service.SecretKey.Delete.Help: Hold CTRL to delete this secret key entry
SettingsUi.Service.SecretKey.InUse: This key is currently assigned to a character and cannot be edited or deleted.
SettingsUi.Service.SecretKey.Register.Su:
New account registered.
Please keep a copy of your secret key in case you need to reset your plugins, or to use it on another PC.
SettingsUi.Service.SecretKey.Register.Un: An unknown error occured. Please try again later.
SettingsUi.Service.Settings.Delete.Help: Hold CTRL to delete this service
SettingsUi.Service.Settings.Name: Service Name
SettingsUi.Service.Settings.Name.Help: You cannot edit the name of the main service.
SettingsUi.Service.Settings.Uri.Help: You cannot edit the URI of the main service.
SettingsUi.Storage.Clear.Help:
You normally do not need to do this. THIS IS NOT SOMETHING YOU SHOULD BE DOING TO TRY TO FIX SYNC ISSUES.
This will solely remove all downloaded data from all players and will require you to re-download everything again.
Snowcloak's storage is self-clearing and will not surpass the limit you have set it to.
If you still think you need to do this hold CTRL while pressing the button.
SettingsUi.Storage.ClearDisclaimer: To clear the local storage accept the following disclaimer
SettingsUi.Storage.ClearDisclaimer.Body:
I understand that: 
- By clearing the local storage I put the file servers of my connected service under extra strain by having to redownload all data.
- This is not a step to try to fix sync issues.
- This can make the situation of not getting other players data worse in situations of heavy file server load.
SettingsUi.Storage.CompactorHint: Hint: To free up space when using Snowcloak consider enabling the File Compactor
SettingsUi.Storage.CompactorUnavailable: The file compactor is only available on Windows and NTFS drives.
SettingsUi.Storage.CompressionLevel.Help: Higher compression levels create smaller uploads. This uses more of your CPU, but allows sync partners to download faster. Level 3 is the default.
SettingsUi.Storage.Description: Snowcloak stores downloaded files from paired people permanently. This is to improve loading performance and requiring less downloads. The storage governs itself by clearing data beyond the set storage size. Please set the storage size accordingly. It is not necessary to manually clear the storage.
SettingsUi.Storage.MultithreadedCompress: When enabled, compression will use a number of workers equal to your CPU thread count. This will alter performance characteristics with different results based on your CPU, enable/disable based on your experience.
SettingsUi.Storage.RemainingSpace: Remaining space free on drive: {0:0.00} GiB
SettingsUi.Storage.ResumeMonitoring.Help:
Attempts to resume monitoring for both Penumbra and Snowcloak Storage. Resuming the monitoring will also force a full scan to run.
If the button remains present after clicking it, consult /xllog for errors
SettingsUi.Storage.StopMonitoring.Help:
Stops the monitoring for both Penumbra and Snowcloak Storage. Do not stop the monitoring, unless you plan to move the Penumbra and Snowcloak Storage folders, to ensure correct functionality of Snowcloak.
If you stop the monitoring to move folders around, resume it after you are finished moving the files.--SEP--Hold CTRL to enable this button
SettingsUi.Storage.UseCompactor.Help:
The file compactor can massively reduce your saved files. It might incur a minor penalty on loading files on a slow CPU.
It is recommended to leave it enabled to save on space.
SettingsUi.Storage.Validation.Completed: The storage validation has completed and removed {0} invalid files from storage.
SettingsUi.Storage.Validation.Descriptio:
File Storage validation can make sure that all files in your local storage folder are valid. Run the validation before you clear the Storage for no reason. 
This operation, depending on how many files you have in your storage, can take a while and will be CPU and drive intensive.
This will render an 'Uploading' text in a larger font.
SettingsUi.Transfers.ShowDownloadText.He: Shows download text (amount of MiB downloaded) in the transfer bars
SettingsUi.Transfers.ShowTransferBars: Show transfer bars rendered below players
SettingsUi.Transfers.ShowTransferBars.He: This will render a progress bar during the download at the feet of the player you are downloading from.
SettingsUi.Transfers.ShowUploading: Show 'Uploading' text below players that are currently uploading
SettingsUi.Transfers.ShowUploading.Help: This will render an 'Uploading' text at the feet of the player that is in progress of uploading data.
SettingsUi.Transfers.ShowWindow.Help: $"The download window will show the current progress of outstanding downloads.{Environment.NewLine}{Environment.NewLine}"$"What do W/Q/P/D stand for?{Environment.NewLine}W = Waiting for Slot (see Maximum Parallel Downloads){Environment.NewLine}"$"Q = Queued on Server, waiting for queue ready signal{Environment.NewLine}"$"P = Processing download (aka downloading){Environment.NewLine}"$"D = Decompressing download"
SettingsUi.Transfers.TransferBarHeight.H: Height of the displayed transfer bars (will never be less tall than the displayed text)
SettingsUi.Transfers.TransferBarWidth.He: Width of the displayed transfer bars (will never be less wide than the displayed text)

CompactUI.AddCharacter.UnknownError: An unknown error occured. Please try again later.
CompactUI.AddCharacter.SecretKeyLength: Your secret key must be exactly 64 characters long.
CompactUI.AddCharacter.NoSecretKeys: No secret keys are configured for the current server.
CompactUI.Pairs.FilterToggleTooltip: Hold Control to {0} pairing with {1} out of {2} displayed users.
CompactUI.Pairs.FilterToggleCooldown: Next execution is available at {0} seconds
CompactUI.Status.Connecting: Attempting to connect to the server.
CompactUI.Status.Reconnecting: Connection to server interrupted, attempting to reconnect to the server.
CompactUI.Status.Disconnected: You are currently disconnected from the sync server.
CompactUI.Status.Offline: Your selected sync server is currently offline.
CompactUI.Status.VersionMismatch: Your plugin or the server you are connecting to is out of date. Please update your plugin now. If you already did so, contact the server provider to update their server to the latest version.
CompactUI.Status.RateLimited: You are rate limited for (re)connecting too often. Disconnect, wait 10 minutes and try again.
CompactUI.Status.NoSecretKey: You have no secret key set for this current character. Use the button below or open the settings and set a secret key for the current character. You can reuse the same secret key for multiple characters.
CompactUI.Status.MultiChara: Your Character Configuration has multiple characters configured with same name and world. You will not be able to connect until you fix this issue. Remove the duplicates from the configuration in Settings -> Service Settings -> Character Management and reconnect manually after.
DataAnalysis.Window.Title: Character Data Analysis
DataAnalysis.Intro.Description: This window shows you all files and their sizes that are currently in use through your character and associated entities
DataAnalysis.Analysis.MissingWarning: Some entries in the analysis have file size not determined yet, press the button below to analyze your current data
DataAnalysis.Analysis.Hint: Click "Start analysis" to calculate download size
DataAnalysis.Conversion.Irreversible: Converting textures to BC7 is irreversible!
DataAnalysis.Conversion.Bullet:
- Converting textures to BC7 will reduce their size (compressed and uncompressed) drastically. It is recommended to be used for large (4k+) textures.
- Some textures, especially ones utilizing colorsets, might not be suited for BC7 conversion and might produce visual artifacts.
- Before converting textures, make sure to have the original files of the mod you are converting so you can reimport it in case of issues.
- Conversion will convert all found texture duplicates (entries with more than 1 file path) automatically.
- Converting textures to BC7 is a very expensive operation and, depending on the amount of textures to convert, will take a while to complete.
DataAnalysis.Conversion.RiskFlag: Flagged as risky for BC7 conversion (colorset/dye path, high alpha transitions, or greyscale map).
DataAnalysis.Conversion.RiskTooltip: Texture flagged as risky (alpha/detail patterns or dye/colorset path). Proceed with caution when converting.
BbCodeTest.Window.Title: Snowcloak BBCode Tester
BbCodeTest.Intro.Description: Preview how Snowcloak renders BBCode inside profile and venue descriptions.
BbCodeTest.Intro.Supported: Supported tags include colours, bold, italics, underline, links, images, emotes, and basic alignment.
BbCodeTest.Input.Label: BBCode Input
BbCodeTest.Preview.Label: Preview
CharaDataHub.Window.Title: Snowcloak Character Data Hub
CharaDataHub.Warning.BrioRequired: To utilize any features related to posing or spawning characters you require to have Brio installed.
CharaDataHub.Apply.Warning: WARNING: During the data application avoid interacting with this actor to prevent potential crashes.
CharaDataHub.Tooltip.CreationBlocked: Cannot use creation tools while having Character Data applied to self.
CharaDataHub.WorldData.None: This Pose has no world data attached.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.BrioRequired: BRIO IS MANDATORY FOR GPOSE TOGETHER.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.MustBeConnect: CANNOT USE GPOSE TOGETHER WHILE DISCONNECTED FROM THE SERVER.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.Title: GPose Together
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.Help:
GPose together is a way to do multiplayer GPose sessions and collaborations.

GPose together requires Brio to function. Only Brio is also supported for the actual posing interactions. Attempting to pose using other tools will lead to conflicts and exploding characters.

To use GPose together you either create or join a GPose Together Lobby. After you and other people have joined, make sure that everyone is on the same map. It is not required for you to be on the same server, DC or instance. Users that are on the same map will be drawn as moving purple wisps in the overworld, so you can easily find each other.

Once you are close to each other you can initiate GPose. You must either assign or spawn characters for each of the lobby users. Their own poses and positions to their character will be automatically applied.
Pose and location data during GPose are updated approximately every few seconds.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.LeaveTooltip: Leave the current GPose lobby.--SEP--Hold CTRL and click to leave.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.SendUpdateToo: This will send your current appearance, pose and world data to all users in the lobby.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.AssignOnlyInG: Assigning users to characters is only available in GPose.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.NoOtherUsers: No other users in current GPose lobby
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.ApplyData: Apply newly received character data to selected actor.--SEP--Note: If the button is grayed out, the latest data has already been applied.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.SpawnApplyToo: Spawn new actor, apply character data and and assign it to this user.--SEP--Note: If the button is grayed out, the user has not sent any character data or you are on the same map, server and instance. If the latter is the case, join a group with that user and assign the character to them.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.MapTooltip:
{0}--SEP--Note: Click to open the users location on your map.
Note: For GPose synchronization to work properly, you must be on the same map.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.MapSame: You are on the same map.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.MapDifferent: You are not on the same map.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.ServerTooltip: {0}--SEP--Note: GPose synchronization is not dependent on the current server, but you will have to spawn a character for the other lobby users.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.ServerSame: You are on the same server.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.ServerDiffere: You are not on the same server.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.InstanceSame: You are in the same instanced area.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.InstanceDiffe: You are not the same instanced area.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.InstanceNote:
Note: Users not in your instance, but on the same map, will be drawn as floating wisps.
Note: GPose synchronization is not dependent on the current instance, but you will have to spawn a character for the other lobby users.
CharaDataHub.GposeTogether.NoValidCharac: No valid character assigned for this user. Pose data will not be applied.
CharaDataHub.Mcd.SelectEntry: Select an entry above to edit its data.
CharaDataHub.Mcd.NoUpdateDto: Something went awfully wrong and there's no update DTO. Try updating Character Data via the button above.
CharaDataHub.Mcd.Updating: Updating data on server, please wait.
CharaDataHub.Mcd.AccessHelp:
You can control who has access to your character data based on the access restrictions.--SEP--Specified: Only people and syncshells you directly specify in 'Specific Individuals / Syncshells' can access this character data
Direct Pairs: Only people you have directly paired can access this character data
All Pairs: All people you have paired can access this character data
Everyone: Everyone can access this character data--SEP--Note: To access your character data the person in question requires to have the code. Exceptions for 'Shared' data, see 'Sharing' below.
Note: For 'Direct' and 'All Pairs' the pause state plays a role. Paused people will not be able to access your character data.
Note: Directly specified Individuals or Syncshells in the 'Specific Individuals / Syncshells' list will be able to access your character data regardless of pause or pair state.
CharaDataHub.Mcd.SharingHelp:
This regulates how you want to distribute this character data.--SEP--Code Only: People require to have the code to download this character data
Shared: People that are allowed through 'Access Restrictions' will have this character data entry displayed in 'Shared with You' (it can also be accessed through the code)--SEP--Note: Shared is incompatible with Access Restriction 'Everyone'
CharaDataHub.Mcd.SetAppearanceHelp: This will overwrite the appearance data currently stored in this Character Data entry with your current appearance.
CharaDataHub.Mcd.PreviewAppearanceHelp: This will download and apply the saved character data to yourself. Once loaded it will automatically revert itself within 15 seconds.--SEP--Note: Weapons will not be displayed correctly unless using the same job as the saved data.
CharaDataHub.Mcd.FileHashes: {0} unique file hashes (original upload: {1} file hashes)
CharaDataHub.Mcd.FilesPresent: All files to download this character data are present on the server

CharaDataHub.Nearby.Title: Poses Nearby
CharaDataHub.Nearby.Help:
This tab will show you all Shared World Poses nearby you.

Shared World Poses are poses in character data that have world data attached to them and are set to shared. This means that all data that is in 'Shared with You' that has a pose with world data attached to it will be shown here if you are nearby.
By default all poses that are shared will be shown. Poses taken in housing areas will by default only be shown on the correct world and location.

Shared World Poses will appear in the world as floating wisps, as well as in the list below. You can mouse over a Shared World Pose in the list for it to get highlighted in the world.

You can apply Shared World Poses to yourself or spawn the associated character to pose with them.

You can adjust the filter and change further settings in the 'Settings & Filter' foldout.
CharaDataHub.Nearby.OnlyCurrentWorld: Only show Poses on current world
CharaDataHub.Nearby.OnlyCurrentWorldHelp: Show the location of shared Poses with World Data from current world only
CharaDataHub.Nearby.ShowOwnHelp: Show your own Poses as well
CharaDataHub.Nearby.IgnoreHousingHelp: Display all poses in their location regardless of housing limitations. (Ignoring Ward, Plot, Room)--SEP--Note: Poses that utilize housing props, furniture, etc. will not be displayed correctly if not spawned in the right location.
CharaDataHub.Nearby.ShowWisps: Show Pose Wisps in the overworld
CharaDataHub.Nearby.ShowWispsHelp: Draw floating wisps where other's poses are in the world.
CharaDataHub.Nearby.DetectionDistanceHel: Maximum distance in which poses will be shown. Set it to the maximum if you want to see all poses on the current map.
CharaDataHub.Nearby.AlwaysShow: Keep active outside Poses Nearby tab
CharaDataHub.Nearby.AlwaysShowHelp: Continue the calculation of position of wisps etc. active outside of the 'Poses Nearby' tab.--SEP--Note: The wisps etc. will disappear during combat and performing.
CharaDataHub.Nearby.GposeOnly: Spawning and applying pose data is only available in GPose.
CharaDataHub.Nearby.NoPoses: No Shared World Poses found nearby.
CharaDataHub.Nearby.OpenMap: Click to open corresponding map and set map marker
CharaDataHub.Nearby.SpawnPoseTooltip: Spawn actor and apply pose and position
CharaDataHub.Nearby.UpdateSharedTooltip: You can only refresh all character data from server every minute. Please wait.

EditProfileUi.RuleOffensiveConsequences: - In the event we receive a report of an offensive profile, we may disable your profile forever or terminate your Snowcloak service account.
EditProfileUi.RulePairedVisibility: Users that are paired with you (not paused) will be able to see your profile picture and description.
EditProfileUi.RuleReporting: All users have the capability to report your profile if it violates the rules.

PlayerAnalysisUI.MissingEntriesWarning: Some entries in the analysis have file size not determined yet, press the button below to compute missing data
PlayerAnalysisUI.CalculateDownloadToolti: Click "Start analysis" to calculate download size
UISharedService.StorageFolderNote: Note: The storage folder should be somewhere close to root (i.e. C\SnowcloakStorage) in a new empty folder. DO NOT point this to your game folder. DO NOT point this to your Penumbra folder.
UISharedService.StopMonitoringTooltip: Stop the Monitoring before changing the Storage folder. As long as monitoring is active, you cannot change the Storage folder location.
UISharedService.PenumbraPathWarning: Do not point the storage path directly to the Penumbra directory. If necessary, make a subfolder in it.
UISharedService.OneDriveWarning: Do not point the storage path to a folder in OneDrive. Do not use OneDrive folders for any Mod related functionality.
UISharedService.FolderNotWritable: The folder you selected does not exist or cannot be written to. Please provide a valid path.
UISharedService.FolderContainsOtherFiles: Your selected directory has files or directories inside that are not Snowcloak related. Use an empty directory or a previous storage directory only.
UISharedService.InvalidPathCharacters: Your selected directory contains illegal characters unreadable by FFXIV. Restrict yourself to latin letters (A-Z), underscores (_), dashes (-) and arabic numbers (0-9).
UISharedService.StorageAutoManagement: The storage is automatically governed by Snowcloak. It will clear itself automatically once it reaches the set capacity according to the selected eviction strategy. You typically do not need to clear it yourself.
UISharedService.EvictionHelp: Choose how Snowcloak removes files when the storage exceeds the configured size. TTL automatically purges files that have not been used in the last 30 days.
UISharedService.StorageScanNote: Note: it is possible to have more files in storage than scanned in, this is due to the scanner normally ignoring those files but the game loading them in and using them on your character, so they get added to the local storage.
UISharedService.UnavailableOrOutdated: unavailable or not up to date.
UISharedService.OptionalAddonsDescriptio: These addons are not required for basic operation, but without them you may not see others as intended.
UISharedService.MandatoryPluginsMissing: You need to install both Penumbra and Glamourer and keep them up to date to use Snowcloak.
SyncshellAdminUI.OneTimeInviteExplanatio: One-time invites work as single-use passwords. Use those if you do not want to distribute your Syncshell password.
SyncshellAdminUI.SingleOneTimeInviteTool: Creates a single-use password for joining the syncshell which is valid for 24h and copies it to the clipboard.
SyncshellAdminUI.NoUsersFound: No users found in this Syncshell
SyncshellAdminUI.CtrlEnableHint: Hold CTRL to enable this button
SyncshellAdminUI.ClearSyncshellTooltip: This will remove all non-pinned, non-moderator users from the Syncshell.
SyncshellAdminUI.CheckInactiveUsersToolt: This will start the prune process for this Syncshell of inactive users that have not logged in the past {0} days.
SyncshellAdminUI.InactiveUsersReview: You will be able to review the amount of inactive users before executing the prune.
SyncshellAdminUI.PruneExcludesNote: Note: pruning excludes pinned users and moderators of this Syncshell.
SyncshellAdminUI.InactiveUsersFound: Found {0} user(s) that have not logged in the past {1} days.
SyncshellAdminUI.PruneComplete: Syncshell was pruned and {0} inactive user(s) have been removed.
SyncshellAdminUI.PasswordRequirement: Password requires to be at least 10 characters long. This action is irreversible.
SyncshellAdminUI.PasswordChangeFailed: Failed to change the password. Password requires to be at least 10 characters long.
SyncshellAdminUI.DeleteSyncshellTooltip: Hold CTRL and Shift and click to delete this Syncshell.
VenueRegistrationUI.NoPendingRegistratio: No pending venue registration. Use /venue to verify a placard first.
VenueRegistrationUI.NoAdminGroups: You must own or moderate a syncshell to register a venue.
VenueRegistrationUI.SyncshellAssociation: Syncshell association cannot be changed for an existing venue.
VenueRegistrationUI.SelectSyncshellToolt: Choose which syncshell will own this venue entry.
VenueRegistrationUI.VenueNameTooltip: Required: this is the display name shown to visitors.
VenueRegistrationUI.SyncshellAliasToolti: Optional: set how this syncshell should appear; the server applies it as the syncshell alias.
VenueRegistrationUI.VenueNameColourToolt: Leave as white to use the default syncshell colour, or pick a custom override for the venue name.
VenueRegistrationUI.VenueHostTooltip: Optional: who should be listed as the venue host.
VenueRegistrationUI.VenueWebsiteTooltip: Optional: external link for the venue.
VenueRegistrationUI.VenueDescriptionTool: Optional: a short description shown on the venue listing.
VenueRegistrationUI.MustBeConnected: You must be connected to Snowcloak to submit a venue registration.
VenueRegistrationUI.SubmitRegistrationEr: An error occurred while submitting the registration.
GroupPanel.PublicSyncshellWarningBody1: Public Syncshells can contain lots of people, and these people may gather in one particular spot.
GroupPanel.PublicSyncshellWarningBody2: This can cause significant load on both the server, and your PC. If you have a lower-end computer, we STRONGLY recommend that you do not join public syncshells.
GroupPanel.PublicSyncshellWarningBody3: Please note that these syncshells are not provided with the intention of facilitating large gatherings. In the event that one occurs, public syncshells will be automatically disabled and paused for all members to protect the functionality of the rest of the service.
